name: jjsquawk
story: Release  in 1993, distributed by Able and developed by Athena , J. J. Squawkers is, on the surface, your typical 90s platformer. As Ani (player one) or Ototo (player two), you must resore peace to Pastachioville by beating up pretty much anyone or anything that gets in your way over five (technically four- one's a boss rush) side-scrolling stages.
